#text=This year for vacation , we decide we wanted to to Ireland .
#text=Well never having flown in a plane the thought of flying was a bit frightening .
#text=We scheduled are vacation and our nerves were getting the best of us all since this new to our family .
#text=The day arrived that we were to leave , we arrived early since we did n't know how long it would take to get through all the checkpoint i the airport .
#text=We checked our bags and got through security and anxiously waited to board our plane .
#text=The kids we are anxious to get aboard and see what it was like , I , however was trying to convince myself this was going to be a fun experience .
#text=We finally got to board the plane , we were directed to our seats by the stewardess and we all sat down and got ready for take-off .

#text=The plane engines started to roar and we taxied down the runway , the plane went faster and faster , looking out the window we could see the ground dropping farther and farther away as the plane rose into the air .
#text=Once we wereup in the air we realized there was not much to be frighten for and the excitement set in to see a new country , We were on our way to Ireland !
